name: Tulum Hemingway Romantic Cabanas

reviews.text: Imagine Hemingway's as a garden with cabanas and hammocks on a beautiful stretch of beach, the sort of place one would dream of but not really expect to ever experience. We loved our stay there.
reviews.title: Cabanas on a beautiful stretch of beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were well cleaned by very friendly staff every day and the hammocks were such a treat. We spent some time in a cabana (tortuga) just a step back from the beach, which was wonderful. The garden cabana we occupied afterwards (delphin) was nice inside, but quite a bit hotter (no wind) and the bathroom had no door, which might not be appreciated by everybody. You also occasionally heard passing cars, which is not a problem, but well, just to hear the sea and bird sounds is nicer and probably worth the price difference. In both cabanas, we enjoyed our private veranda!
reviews.title: R and R ( Romance and Relaxation)

description: Hemingway's private paradise for special customers who want to experience first-hand experience with the wonderful nature of the beach of Tulum. 52 km of tropical beach to walk and contemplate the sea and a nature "dream". Hemingway's restaurant on the beach serves fresh seafood with pasta and homemade bread.This is a small ecological resort immersed in a very lush garden with many palms and typical plants of the area and it is also surrounded by an uncontaminated tropical forest, about 6 km from the protected Sian Ka’an area, declared as the Biosphere Reservation. The Resort is the a suitable place for relaxing for those who want to find peace and serenity.
